title: BREEZER and NYLON organizes BREEZER x NYLON HOUSE PARTY Thailand’s first music festival in water parkTravelandtourworld.com
text:
BREEZER and NYLON organizes BREEZER x NYLON HOUSE PARTY Thailand’s first music festival in water park Published on : Sunday, October 25, 2015
BREEZER together with NYLON recently organized BREEZER x NYLON HOUSE PARTY, Thailand’s first music festival in a water park, gathering famous artists and leading Thai DJs to create non-stop fun at Santorini Water Fantasy.
Leading DJs excited the event included Bang Bang Bang Ft. Twopee Southside, DJ Faahsai, DJ Botcash, DJ Roxy June , DJ Machina and DJ Make You Freak.
“BREEZER continues to excite consumers with fun activities by being the official sponsor for this music festival. We held BREEZER x NYLON HOUSE PARTY, an exclusive party which BREEZER lovers enjoyed famous artists and leading Thai DJs at the BREEZER DJ Stage as well as other amazing entertainment. Please be prepared for upcoming new events that will bring fun, out-of-the-box experiences specially created by BREEZER. Please follow us to get all the news and movements,” said Arya Intasuwan, Brand Manager, BREEZER.
